title: 5W-KILO
author: 5W-KILO
content: Anyone ever use one these sia coin miners? Gold shell make miners for LTC and Doge, even Sia and Kadena too, what do you think? How strong are Goldshell hardware?

comments.author: philipma1957
comments.body: goldshell is okay a lot depends on the price you pay for it.

comments.author: badbart
comments.body: I have the small doge miner, not  profitable but runs fine.

comments.author: 5W-KILO
comments.body: Quote from: badbart on September 28, 2022, 08:06:07 PMI have the small doge miner, not  profitable but runs fine.Which one do you have? Can you please share a picture?

comments.author: swogerino
comments.body: Quote from: badbart on September 28, 2022, 08:06:07 PMI have the small doge miner, not  profitable but runs fine.Nothing is profitable right now but you are doing great that you are running the machine,usually Goldshell devices if you have a mini one do not consume a lot of energy and I think this is the strongest selling point of the Goldshell manufacturer.You will thank yourself later in the long term in the next bull run as long as you keep the miner running and your DOGE number increasing everyday,that is what I call a win and well done to you.
